if-community-is-approved: After applying for participation and getting approved, you can access it.
after-join: After applying for participation and getting approved, you

empty.withdraw-1: Joining a community automatically adds you to the group chat.
empty.withdraw-2: Feel free to chat with members in the chat!
empty.withdraw-3: ※ Leaving the community will also automatically exit from the chat.

dialog.confirm: Are you sure you want to leave the community?
dialog.note: Leaving the community also means exiting the group chat.
dialog.confirm-delete-title: Are you sure you want to delete the post?
dialog.note-delete-title1: Blocking will force you to leave this community, and you won't be able to browse or rejoin this community.
dialog.note-delete-title2: If you want to report to the administration, please do so from the profile or private message screen of the person in question.
dialog.note-delete-title: Deleting will make the post content and comments on the post no longer viewable.

comment.delete-community: Are you sure you want to delete the comment?

form.name: Community Name

placeholder.name: Enter within 40 characters
placeholder.administrator: Select members you want to add as administrators
placeholder.tag: Setting community tags makes it easier to search

form.explain: Administrators can perform all management except for deleting the community.

dialog.title: Delete Community
dialog.content: Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to delete it?

dialog-block.title: Block user?
dialog-block.content: If you want to report to the administration, please do so from the profile or private message screen of the person in question.
dialog-block.content1: Blocking will force you to leave this community, and you won't be able to browse or rejoin this community.
dialog-block.content2: If you want to report to the administration, please do so from the profile or private message screen of the person in question.

dialog-unblock.title: Unblock user?
dialog-unblock.content: Unblocking will allow the user to join this community and view its content.

participation.title: Join Requests

participation.empty-public1: This community does not require approval.
